title: Will Trump remove tariff on Canada before May?
description: This market resolves to YES if Donald Trump removes tariffs on Canadian imports before May 2025, and NO otherwise.

title: EU Economic Growth Rate
conditional: Will the EU economic growth rate exceed 2% in 2024?
description: This market resolves to YES if the EU economic growth rate exceeds 2% in 2024, and NO otherwise.

title: New Tax Bill Passage
conditional: Will the new tax bill pass before the end of the year?
description: This market resolves to YES if the proposed tax bill passes through Congress and is signed into law before December 31, 2024.

title: Presidential Debate Viewership
conditional: Will the first 2024 presidential debate exceed 75 million viewers?
description: This market resolves to YES if the first presidential debate of the 2024 election cycle exceeds 75 million viewers across all platforms.

title: Senate Majority 2024
conditional: Which party will control the Senate after the 2024 elections?
description: This market resolves based on which political party controls the majority of seats in the US Senate following the 2024 elections.

options.title: Democrats
options.description: Democratic Party controls the majority of seats in the US Senate after the 2024 elections

options.title: Republicans
options.description: Republican Party controls the majority of seats in the US Senate after the 2024 elections

title: Supreme Court Vacancy 2024
conditional: Will there be a Supreme Court vacancy before the end of 2024?
description: This market resolves to YES if any sitting Supreme Court Justice retires, resigns, or passes away creating a vacancy before December 31, 2024.

title: Major Constitutional Case Ruling by 2026
description: This market resolves to YES if the Supreme Court issues a landmark ruling on a major constitutional question related to executive power or federal election laws before the end of 2026.

title: EU-UK Trade Agreement by 2026
description: This market resolves to YES if the EU and UK sign a new comprehensive trade agreement by the end of 2026, and NO otherwise.

title: Who will win the 2025 Copa Libertadores?
description: This market resolves based on which team wins the 2025 Copa Libertadores tournament.

options.title: Palmeiras
options.description: Brazilian team Palmeiras wins the 2025 Copa Libertadores

options.title: Flamengo
options.description: Brazilian team Flamengo wins the 2025 Copa Libertadores

options.title: River Plate
options.description: Argentine team River Plate wins the 2025 Copa Libertadores

options.title: Boca Juniors
options.description: Argentine team Boca Juniors wins the 2025 Copa Libertadores

title: NBA Champion 2024
description: This market resolves based on which team wins the 2024 NBA Championship.

options.title: Celtics
options.description: Boston Celtics win the 2024 NBA Championship

options.title: Nuggets
options.description: Denver Nuggets win the 2024 NBA Championship

options.title: Bucks
options.description: Milwaukee Bucks win the 2024 NBA Championship

options.title: Clippers
options.description: LA Clippers win the 2024 NBA Championship

title: NCAA March Madness Champion 2026
description: This market resolves based on which team wins the 2026 NCAA Men's Basketball Tournament (March Madness).

options.title: UConn
options.description: UConn Huskies win the 2026 NCAA Tournament

options.title: Gonzaga
options.description: Gonzaga Bulldogs win the 2026 NCAA Tournament

options.title: Duke
options.description: Duke Blue Devils win the 2026 NCAA Tournament

options.title: Field
options.description: Any other team wins the 2026 NCAA Tournament

title: FIFA World Cup 2026 Winner
description: This market resolves based on which country wins the 2026 FIFA World Cup.

options.title: Brazil
options.description: Brazil wins the 2026 FIFA World Cup

options.title: France
options.description: France wins the 2026 FIFA World Cup

options.title: Argentina
options.description: Argentina wins the 2026 FIFA World Cup

options.title: England
options.description: England wins the 2026 FIFA World Cup

title: Wimbledon Men's Champion 2024
description: This market resolves based on which player wins the Men's Singles title at Wimbledon 2024.

options.title: Novak Djokovic
options.description: Novak Djokovic wins the Men's Singles title at Wimbledon 2024

options.title: Carlos Alcaraz
options.description: Carlos Alcaraz wins the Men's Singles title at Wimbledon 2024

options.title: Jannik Sinner
options.description: Jannik Sinner wins the Men's Singles title at Wimbledon 2024

options.title: Field
options.description: Any other player wins the Men's Singles title at Wimbledon 2024

title: US Open Women's Champion 2024
description: This market resolves based on which player wins the Women's Singles title at the US Open 2024.

options.title: Iga Swiatek
options.description: Iga Swiatek wins the Women's Singles title at the US Open 2024

options.title: Aryna Sabalenka
options.description: Aryna Sabalenka wins the Women's Singles title at the US Open 2024

options.title: Coco Gauff
options.description: Coco Gauff wins the Women's Singles title at the US Open 2024

options.title: Field
options.description: Any other player wins the Women's Singles title at the US Open 2024

title: F1 Constructors' Championship 2024
description: This market resolves based on which team wins the Formula 1 Constructors' Championship for the 2024 season.

options.title: Red Bull Racing
options.description: Red Bull Racing wins the 2024 F1 Constructors' Championship

options.title: Ferrari
options.description: Ferrari wins the 2024 F1 Constructors' Championship

options.title: Mercedes
options.description: Mercedes wins the 2024 F1 Constructors' Championship

options.title: McLaren
options.description: McLaren wins the 2024 F1 Constructors' Championship

title: Fed interest rate by end of 2024?
description: This market resolves based on what the Federal Reserve interest rate will be at the end of 2024.

options.title: Above 5.5%
options.description: Federal Reserve interest rate will be above 5.5% at the end of 2024

options.title: Between 4.5% and 5.5%
options.description: Federal Reserve interest rate will be between 4.5% and 5.5% at the end of 2024

options.title: Between 3.5% and 4.5%
options.description: Federal Reserve interest rate will be between 3.5% and 4.5% at the end of 2024

title: ECB Interest Rate Policy 2026
conditional: Will the European Central Bank cut interest rates below 2% by the end of 2026?
description: This market resolves to YES if the European Central Bank reduces its key interest rate below 2% at any point before December 31, 2026.

title: US Unemployment Rate Q3 2024
description: This market resolves based on what the US unemployment rate will be at the end of Q3 2024 (September 30, 2024).

options.title: Below 3.5%
options.description: US unemployment rate will be below 3.5% at the end of Q3 2024

options.title: Between 3.5% and 4.0%
options.description: US unemployment rate will be between 3.5% and 4.0% at the end of Q3 2024

options.title: Between 4.0% and 4.5%
options.description: US unemployment rate will be between 4.0% and 4.5% at the end of Q3 2024

options.title: Above 4.5%
options.description: US unemployment rate will be above 4.5% at the end of Q3 2024

title: US GDP Growth 2024
description: This market resolves based on the annual US GDP growth rate for the full year 2024.

options.title: Negative Growth
options.description: US GDP will show negative growth for the full year 2024

options.title: 0% to 1.5%
options.description: US GDP will grow between 0% and 1.5% for the full year 2024

options.title: 1.5% to 3.0%
options.description: US GDP will grow between 1.5% and 3.0% for the full year 2024

options.title: Above 3.0%
options.description: US GDP will grow more than 3.0% for the full year 2024

title: Inflation Rate End of 2024
description: This market resolves based on the annual US inflation rate (CPI) as of December 2024.

options.title: Below 2.0%
options.description: US inflation rate will be below 2.0% at the end of 2024

options.title: 2.0% to 3.0%
options.description: US inflation rate will be between 2.0% and 3.0% at the end of 2024

options.title: 3.0% to 4.0%
options.description: US inflation rate will be between 3.0% and 4.0% at the end of 2024

options.title: Above 4.0%
options.description: US inflation rate will be above 4.0% at the end of 2024

title: Housing Market 2024
conditional: Will US median home prices increase or decrease in 2024?
description: This market resolves based on whether the median US home price increases or decreases for the full year 2024 compared to 2023.

title: Bitcoin price above $100k in 2024?
conditional: Will Bitcoin price exceed $100,000 at any point during 2024?
description: This market resolves to YES if the price of Bitcoin exceeds $100,000 USD on any major exchange at any point during 2024.

title: Bitcoin Mining Difficulty Increase by 30%
conditional: Will Bitcoin mining difficulty increase by at least 30% by end of 2026?
description: This market resolves to YES if the Bitcoin network mining difficulty increases by at least 30% from its June 2024 levels by the end of 2026.

title: Ethereum to flip Bitcoin by market cap in 2024?
conditional: Will Ethereum's market cap exceed Bitcoin's at any point during 2024?
description: This market resolves to YES if Ethereum's total market capitalization exceeds Bitcoin's total market capitalization at any point during 2024.

title: Ethereum Major Protocol Upgrade in 2026
conditional: Will Ethereum implement a major protocol upgrade in 2026?
description: This market resolves to YES if Ethereum successfully implements a major protocol upgrade (comparable to the Merge or Shanghai upgrade) during 2026.

title: UEFA Champions League Winner 2024
description: This market resolves based on which team wins the 2023-2024 UEFA Champions League.

options.title: Manchester City
options.description: Manchester City wins the 2023-2024 UEFA Champions League

options.title: Real Madrid
options.description: Real Madrid wins the 2023-2024 UEFA Champions League

options.title: Bayern Munich
options.description: Bayern Munich wins the 2023-2024 UEFA Champions League

options.title: Liverpool
options.description: Liverpool wins the 2023-2024 UEFA Champions League

title: Will Elon Musk mention Dogecoin on Twitter in March 2024?
conditional: Will Elon Musk mention Dogecoin on his Twitter/X account during March 2024?
description: This market resolves to YES if Elon Musk mentions Dogecoin or $DOGE on his Twitter/X account at any point during March 2024.
